name.ja: ヴォイドヴェルグ・シュラウド

requirement.en: Equip this card to 1 face-up Galaxy Type monster on your field.

effect.en: The equipped monster gains ATK equal to [the number of Spell/Trap Cards on your field] x 100. While the equipped monster is face-up on your field, Spell/Trap Cards on your field cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
